recipesJson.name: Mango Yogurt
recipesJson.author: insan0r
recipesJson.description:
A simple, sweet mango yogurt recipe

The sweet cream adds the mouthfeel and the FW yogurt is just simply the bee's knees amongst the yogurt flavors. I wouldn't recommend to use more than 2%.

reviews.text: It's mango and yogurt . Solid recipe. Nice job
you've earned your first 5 stars here!
